name: Days Inn - Alexander City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stopped here for an overnight stay on a roadtrip. It's a Best Western, and pretty typical of a 80s hotel. Room had kind of a musty smell as if it hadn't been aired out in awhile, but was clean. A bit on the small side - fine for two people but more than that would get uncomfortable.
reviews.title: Average

reviews.text: TV had lots of stations. Free internet is available, but you must get the username and password from the front desk. Free breakfast in the morning is simple but edible.
reviews.title: Quite A Nice Best Western

likes.liked: — It was really a great motel overall
likes.disliked: — Actually, I can't think of anything negative to be said about this motel

description: Rest easy and relax at our Days Inn – Alexander City hotel. Located just off Highway 280 at the intersection of Highway 22, our pet-friendly hotel is just minutes away from various outdoor activities, attractions and dining options.All inclusive rate at the hotel include free breakfast, free internet and free local calls. Stay fit in our Fitness center and enjoy our outdoor pool and sun deck. Earn Wyndham Rewards points.
